abstract: Hoboken Mayor Dawn Zimmer says water has been restored to most households in city, but that repairs on water main that broke over weekend will likely continue beyond Thanksgiving; water main break left much of city without water and left many residents concerned about city's aging infrastructure.
lead_paragraph: In a faint echo of the damage done by Hurricane Sandy, a broken 36-inch water main flooded the streets of this New Jersey city over the weekend and left homes without tap water.

headline.main: Snapped Water Pipe in Hoboken Upsets City’s Daily Routine
headline.print_headline: Snapped Pipe in Hoboken Upsets City’s Daily Routine

snippet: In a faint echo of the damage done by Hurricane Sandy, a broken 36-inch water main flooded the streets of this New Jersey city over the weekend and left homes without tap water.
